mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, BRAND_ID AS brandId, PRICE, COLOR, DESCRIPTION, CATEGORY, STYLE, FIT, SEASON, IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl FROM PRODUCT

SELECT P.ID, P.NAME, P.IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl, B.BRAND_NAME AS brand, MAX(DSB.FLOOR) AS floor, P.PRICE FROM ( SELECT TARGET_ID FROM ( SELECT R.TARGET_ID FROM RECOMMEND_RESULT R WHERE R.SOURCE_ID = #{productId} ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 ) RR JOIN PRODUCT P ON RR.TARGET_ID = P.ID JOIN BRAND B ON P.BRAND_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT_STORE_BRAND DSB ON P.BRAND_ID = DSB.BRAND_ID AND DSB.DEPARTMENT_STORE_ID = #{departmentStoreId} GROUP BY P.ID, P.NAME, P.IMAGE_URL, B.BRAND_NAME, P.PRICE
